#comprehensive support schools
```{r}

comprehensive_schools <-  schools_identified %>%  filter(level_support=="Comprehensive") %>% select(schoolid, Metro7county, districtname_new, SCHOOLNAME_NEW, district_type, level_support, Title1, student_group, reason_identification )

datatable(comprehensive_schools)
```



```{r}
high_schools <-  schools_identified %>%  filter(school_type=="H") %>% select(schoolid, Metro7county, districtname_new, SCHOOLNAME_NEW, district_type, level_support, Title1, student_group, reason_identification )

datatable(high_schools)
```

#Schools identified

```{r}
schools_identified%>% group_by(district_name, school_name, level_support)%>%
   summarise(count=n()) %>% 
  knitr::kable("html") %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"), full_width = F, position="left")
```
